{"templates": {"default": (80,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (2, 2), size = (100, 75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 1), size = (600, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 29), size = (360, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 54), size = (360, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (465, 29), size = (240, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (465, 54), size = (240, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (80,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 10), size = (710, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 40), size = (710, 50), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 80 }
